author: VNExplorer
title: Chris Christie releases scathing attack ad against Donald Trump
text:
GettyImages-1860798123.jpg
Former New Jersey governor Chris Christie released an ad responding to calls for him to drop out of Republican presidential primary, saying he is the only candidate willing to publicly say what many Republicans say about former president Donald Trump privately.
Mr Christie released the ad to be played in New Hampshire just weeks before the first in the nation primary begins. The former governor has campaigned heavily in the Granite State before its 23 January contest.
Mr Christie responded to criticisms that he should get out of the race, since he is preventing the consolidation of non-Trump voters.
‚ÄúReally? I‚Äôm the only one saying Donald Trump is a liar,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúHe pits Americans against each other.‚Äù
Mr Christie also pointed to Mr Trump sending a message on Christmas criticising his enemies ‚Äúlooking to destroy our once great USA. MAY THEY ROT IN HELL.‚Äù In response, Mr Christie said the twice-impeached-four-times-indicted former president poses a threat.
‚ÄúHe caused the riot on Capitol Hill, he‚Äôll burn America to the ground to help himself,‚Äù he said.
Polling shows that Mr Christie is now in third in New Hampshire. A poll from Saint Anselm College Survey Center showed that he is at 12 per cent, behind former South Carolina governor Nikki Haley, who polls at 15 per cent; and former president Donald Trump, who polls at 44 per cent.
Mr Christie has largely run his campaign on opposing Mr Trump, arguing that he simply says what every other Republican thinks of the former president. In addition, he‚Äôs criticised his fellow Republicans in the race for not acknowledging Mr Trump‚Äôs actions.
‚ÄúEvery Republican leader says that in private, I‚Äôm the only one saying it in public,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWhat kind of President Do we want a liar or someone who‚Äôs got the guts to tell the truth?‚Äù
From news to politics, travel to sport, culture to climate ‚Äì The Independent has a host of free newsletters to suit your interests. To find the stories you want to read, and more, in your inbox, click here.

author: Tod Palmer
title: Chiefs WR Rashee Rice enjoys record-setting playoff debut despite record cold
text: KANSAS CITY, Mo. ‚Äî The NFL playoffs are supposed to be harder, a notch above the regular season, right? ‚ÄúOne-hundred percent ‚Äî when we started practice this week, we had a jog-through and it was not a jog-through,‚Äù Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice said. ‚ÄúWe were going full speed, so I could tell right there.‚Äù But if [Saturday night‚Äôs 26-7 win against Miami](https://www.kshb.com/sports/football/chiefs/ice-cold-wild-card-romp-chiefs-dominate-dolphins-at-frigid-arrowhead-to-advance) in an AFC Super Wild Card showdown in [the coldest game ever played at GEHA Field](https://www.kshb.com/sports/football/chiefs/chiefs-dolphins-wild-card-showdown-ranks-as-4th-coldest-game-in-nfl-history) at Arrowhead Stadium was, in fact, tougher for Rice than the regular season ‚Äî well, the rookie second-round pick from SMU didn‚Äôt show it. Instead, Rice set Chiefs playoff records for a rookie for catches and receiving yards, helping earn a seventh straight AFC Divisional Round appearance for the franchise. Rice‚Äôs eight catches were one more than Knile Davis‚Äô seven during the 2013 postseason, while his 130 yards topped the 104 receiving yards Elmo Wright racked up during the longest game in NFL history, a double-overtime loss to the Dolphins on Christmas Day 1971. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs hard to believe that he‚Äôs a rookie,‚Äú Kansas City coach Andy Reid said. For years, it's been established fact in the NFL ‚Äî almost folklore, really ‚Äî that Reid‚Äôs complex offense, which features endless option routes and ingenuity, is among the most difficult for incoming receivers to grasp. Rice certainly needed time to adjust, showing flashes of greatness and making basic rookie blunders during camp and early in the season. But against Miami with the season on the line, he found soft spots in zones, moved the chains and continued to prove that he‚Äôs quarterback Patrick Mahomes‚Äô most-trusted weapon among Kansas City‚Äôs wide receivers. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs doing great,‚Äù Mahomes said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs getting better and better every single week. Some of those guys hit that rookie wall, but he seems like he‚Äôs just pushed right through it and continues to get better and better.‚Äù Since the start of training camp, Rice, who briefly left his playoff debut after banging his left foot on the rock-hard sideline, said the biggest stride he‚Äôs made is being able to take lessons imparted during meetings and putting them into action at practice. Reid has noticed, too. ‚ÄúWe were hoping that he was as good as what we saw at SMU,‚Äù Reid said. ‚ÄúThe best part about him is he just keeps working. He‚Äôs relentless with that. He‚Äôs got a good relationship; he‚Äôs got Pat‚Äôs respect, and he wants to do it the right way.‚Äù ‚Äî

author: Emma Riverola
title: De monges i queixes
text:
Esgl√©sia
De monges i queixes
Les queixes pel for√ß√≥s abandonament de les religioses comparteixen cert eco amb altres laments: quan baixa la persiana una llibreria o desapareixen els quioscos
La marcha de las clarisas del monasterio de Pedralbes moviliza a los vecinos /
All√† eren, rebent la comitiva municipal amb les seves pancartes, protestant per la marxa imminent de les tres religioses que mantenen viva la flama espiritual del monestir de Pedralbes. La missa de diumenge al migdia perdurar√†, per√≤ els murs ja no acolliran la pres√®ncia continuada de les monges. Els n√∫meros s√≥n els n√∫meros, i les vocacions religioses donen per al que donen. √âs a dir, per a poc. L‚Äôorde de les clarisses √©s di√†fana al respecte: √©s preceptiu que les comunitats dels monestirs acullin almenys cinc monges. Davant aquesta situaci√≥, m√©s que aixecar la pancarta ‚Äì¬´No buidem de vida el monestir de Pedralbes¬ª‚Äì es podria elevar les preg√†ries perqu√® torni a prendre la flama vocacional o, posats a fer, animar-se a encarnar la soluci√≥. El cam√≠ de la fe √©s ampli. Segur que l‚ÄôOrdre de Santa Clara estar√† encantada d‚Äôacollir noves postulants, tot i que siguin de vocaci√≥ tardana.
Les queixes davant el for√ß√≥s abandonament de les monges comparteixen cert eco amb altres laments: quan abaixa la persiana d‚Äôuna llibreria, desconcertada per les p√®rdues, o quan desapareixen els quioscos dels carrers, o quan les ciutats es van quedant sense cines. La reacci√≥ no deixa de ser contradict√≤ria. D‚Äôuna banda, protestar per una cosa la continu√Øtat de la qual est√† a les nostres mans. Ja saben: comprar m√©s llibres, m√©s diaris o anar m√©s al cine. De l‚Äôaltra, la necessitat una mica pueril de culpar una inst√†ncia superior del que √©s responsabilitat pr√≤pia. I, encara m√©s, el desig de mantenir un escenari que creiem m√©s afavoridor. Desitjar que perduri una cosa en la qual ja no es participa, per√≤ que parla b√© de nosaltres. Que ens fa semblar m√©s cultes, m√©s interessants, m√©s informats... En definitiva, enyorar el que no som.
Aix√≠ estem, volent retenir el que menyspreem, creient-nos o intentant ser millors del que som i alli√ßonant sobre ensenyaments suspesos estrepitosament. I, s√≠, la reflexi√≥ tamb√© serveix per a l‚Äôexercici pol√≠tic. √âs dif√≠cil reclamar dignitat des de la baixesa de la mentida.

author: @lanacionpy
title: Pasado por agua: lluvias con tormentas persisten en todo el pa√≠s
text:
Ayer, un sistema de tormentas impact√≥ nuestro pa√≠s, dejando acumulados de lluvia significativos. Seg√∫n datos preliminares de las estaciones meteorol√≥gicas autom√°ticas, se registraron valores cercanos a los 40 mm y hasta 95 mm, especialmente en el centro, este y norte de ambas regiones.
Para hoy, viernes 13, las lluvias y tormentas continuar√°n afectando todo el territorio nacional, con alta probabilidad de fen√≥menos meteorol√≥gicos severos puntuales. La Direcci√≥n de Meteorolog√≠a recomienda seguir las actualizaciones de los avisos meteorol√≥gicos vigentes para monitorear constantemente las tormentas.
Para ma√±ana, s√°bado 14, las lluvias se limitar√°n al norte de ambas regiones, mientras que en el resto del pa√≠s se espera una mejor√≠a en las condiciones. Hacia el domingo 15, la probabilidad de lluvia ser√° muy baja a nivel nacional.
En cuanto a las temperaturas, para hoy se prev√©n m√°ximas entre 25 ¬∞C y 32 ¬∞C en las regiones oriental y occidental. Entre el s√°bado y el domingo, se espera un aumento gradual de las temperaturas, marcando el retorno de un ambiente caluroso.

author: rossella.
title: L√≠bano. Muere una mujer francesa de 87 a√±os tras una ‚Äúfuerte explosi√≥n‚Äù en el sur del pa√≠s
text: Un ciudadano franc√©s de 87 a√±os muri√≥ tras una ‚Äúfuerte explosi√≥n‚Äù en un pueblo del sur del L√≠bano, v√≠ctima de intensos bombardeos israel√≠es, supo este jueves el Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores. ‚ÄúLamentamos la muerte ocurrida el pasado lunes de una compatriota de 87 a√±os en un pueblo cercano a la ciudad de Tiro‚Äù donde el edificio en el que resid√≠a se derrumb√≥ tras una ‚Äúfuerte explosi√≥n‚Äù, indic√≥ el Quai d‚ÄôOrsay, sin proporcionar m√°s detalles. M√°s detalles sobre el origen de la explosi√≥n. Este contenido est√° bloqueado porque no ha aceptado cookies ni otros rastreadores. Al hacer clic en ‚ÄúAcepto‚ÄùSe colocar√°n cookies y otros rastreadores y podr√° ver los contenidos. (m√°s informaci√≥n). Al hacer clic en ‚ÄúAcepto todas las cookies‚Äùusted autoriza el almacenamiento de cookies y otros rastreadores para el almacenamiento de sus datos en nuestros sitios y aplicaciones con fines de personalizaci√≥n y orientaci√≥n publicitaria. Puedes retirar tu consentimiento en cualquier momento consultando nuestra pol√≠tica de protecci√≥n de datos. Gestionar mis elecciones Acepto Acepto todas las cookies Francia no tiene conocimiento de otras v√≠ctimas francesas ‚Äúen esta etapa‚Äù en el resto del pa√≠s, seg√∫n la misma fuente. Israel prosigui√≥ este jueves por cuarto d√≠a consecutivo sus ataques a√©reos masivos sobre el este y el sur del L√≠bano, prometiendo luchar contra Hezbol√° ‚Äúhasta la victoria‚Äù. M√°s de 600 muertos desde el lunes Los bombardeos, que han matado a m√°s de 600 personas desde el lunes, incluidos muchos civiles, han arrojado a las carreteras del L√≠bano a m√°s de 90.000 personas, seg√∫n la ONU. M√°s de 22.000 de ellos han entrado en Siria, dijeron fuentes de seguridad de ese pa√≠s. Ante esta escalada que amenaza con arrastrar a Oriente Medio a la guerra, Francia y Estados Unidos, junto con pa√≠ses √°rabes, occidentales y europeos, pidieron el mi√©rcoles un ‚Äúalto el fuego inmediato de 21 d√≠as‚Äù para ‚Äúdar una oportunidad a la diplomacia‚Äù.

author: Lee Digital Content Center, Dataherald
title: Southwest Airlines faces disruptions during holiday travel
text:
Conditions were mostly nice this year for travelers flying ahead of and on Christmas, but some naughty disruptions again plagued those flying with Southwest Airlines.
For millions of people traveling over the holiday, this year was much better than last. Christmas morning put a bow on a relatively smooth weekend.
Only 157 flights within, into or out of the U.S. had been canceled and 2,111 were delayed as of late afternoon on Monday, according to the tracking website FlightAware.
Listen now and subscribe: Apple Podcasts | Google Podcasts | Spotify | RSS Feed | Omny Studio
For this holiday season, U.S. airlines prepared for massive waves of travelers by hiring thousands of pilots, flight attendants and other workers ‚Äî in an effort to avoid the delays and cancellations that marred travel in 2022, culminating with the Southwest Airlines debacle that stranded more than 2 million people.
People are also reading‚Ä¶ Beaver Dam couple have Christmas Eve bond but must wait for gift 'This is going to be huge for the city of Portage': Hemp-based battery company foresees 100s of jobs Students in Aviation courses at Dells-Baraboo Airport start Jan. 6 2 boys killed, 4 other people injured in crash of car fleeing police in Wisconsin, police say Abby Alt fired from Jack Young Middle School principal role Waupun police chief resigns 3 reasons why Beaver Dam girls basketball is a state title contender 5 ways Wisconsin's new alcohol laws could affect you Jersey Mike's opens near Wisconsin Dells Pardeeville's Chandler Park Holiday Lights shine under new coordinators Portage to build shared facility for Parks & Recreation, Public Works 172 deer killed at Beaver Dam farm after CWD outbreak Polzin: What I liked and didn't like from Packers' loss to the Buccaneers Wisconsin university chancellor fired after producing online porn with his wife New Lisbon Community Closet changing hands after over 15 years Still, Southwest experienced hiccups again over the weekend that the airline was looking to clear by Monday.

author: Redacci√≥ Esport3
title: Enigm√†tica amputaci√≥ de peu de LaVar Ball, pare de dues figures de l'NBA
text:
Enigm√†tica amputaci√≥ de peu de LaVar Ball, pare de dues figures de l'NBA
El mitj√† TMZ public√† una foto del Ball despr√©s de la intervenci√≥, per√≤ cap dels germans n'ha aportat informaci√≥
Una de les nissagues estel¬∑lars de l'NBA, els Ball, acaba de viure un episodi traum√†tic. LaVar Ball, el controvertit pare dels jugadors Lonzo (Chicago Bulls) i LaMelo (Charlotte Hornets), aix√≠ com del raper LiAngelo, ha aparegut en una imatge publicada per TMZ en cadira de rodes i el peu dret amputat. Cap dels germans ha aportat informaci√≥ de la intervenci√≥.
LaVar Ball had to get his foot amputated after suffering a serious medical condition üôè
Daily Loud (@DailyLoud)[pic.twitter.com/KMHw1ApZbQ][February 19, 2025]
El mateix mitj√†, per√≤, no ha trigat a explicar que LaVar s'ha sotm√®s a l'amputaci√≥ despr√©s de tenir problemes m√®dics "greus". Afegeixen que malgrat la cirurgia i el tr√†ngol de perdre el peu, l'empresari, de 57 anys, "est√† de molt bon humor".
LaVar Ball, fundador de la marca esportiva Big Baller, va saltar a la primera p√†gina medi√†tica fa una d√®cada amb unes maneres histri√≤niques i de fanfarr√≥. Amb els anys, no es pot negar que si era una estrat√®gia "made in America" per propulsar la carrera dels seus fills, se'n va sortir.

author: TV
title: Strictly's Kai Widdrington and Nadiya Bychkova look loved-up in Slovenian date night selfie
text: Strictly Come Dancing stars Kai Widdrington and Nadiya Bychkova have shared a loved-up \"date night\" selfie from their trip to Slovenia.Taking to his Instagram Story, Kai shared the black-and-white snap of himself and Nadiya, tagging the location as the Slovenian capital Ljubljana.\"Date night,\" he captioned the image, alongside a clip from Michael Bubl√©'s cover of the Eric Clapton song 'Wonderful Tonight'. The pair began dating in May 2022, just months after Kai joined the hit BBC One series as a professional dancer. Kai appeared on the most recent series alongside broadcaster Angela Rippon, while Nadiya ‚Äî who has been part of the show since 2017 ‚Äî did not receive a celebrity partner for the 2023 season. Related: Strictly's Nadiya Bychkova set for surprise career move away from showOutside of Strictly, the couple are set to embark on a tour of the UK across 2024 with their upcoming dance show 'Nadiya Kai: Behind The Magic' ‚Äî which kicks off in June and includes stops in cities such as Edinburgh, York, Manchester, London and Southhampton.Teasing the tour in a video clip on Instagram, the pair gave fans a behind-the-scenes glimpse at the production that goes into the shows and promised an \"epic\" show.\"Join us for our brand new show 'Behind the Magic', giving our fans a rare glimpse behind the curtain to see how the magic comes together!\" they added in the caption.Related: Strictly's Kai Widdrington and Nadiya Bychkova share loved-up photosMeanwhile, Kai has also been announced another new role, joining the British DanceSport Association (BDSA) as a board member and ambassador.\"I am excited to join this new and ambitious organisation and play my part in contributing to a positive change in the dance community,\" he said of the news in an official statement. \"DanceSport already makes such a great impact on so many people's lives, encouraging them to try our fantastic sport. Dance is a passion for me, it gives me so much enjoyment and I want to help others experience the same feeling from it.\"Strictly Come Dancing will return later this year on BBC One, while spin-off Strictly: It Takes Two airs on weeknights on BBC Two. Both shows are available to stream on BBC iPlayer.Tickets for Strictly's 2024 live arena tour are available now.Interested in talking about Strictly Come Dancing? Visit our dedicated sub-forum

author: Reda√ß√£o
title: Paes agradece governo Lula por ‚Äòsolidariedade e apoio‚Äô sobre impacto das chuvas no Rio
text:
14/01/2024 - 14:05
O prefeito do Rio de Janeiro, Eduardo Paes (PSD), agradeceu nesta tarde o apoio do governo federal, em meio √†s fortes chuvas que atingiram o Estado entre s√°bado e a madrugada de hoje. Ele disse que recebeu um telefonema do ministro da Integra√ß√£o e do Desenvolvimento Regional, Waldez G√≥es (PDT), em nome do presidente Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva.
‚ÄúRecebi liga√ß√£o do ministro @waldezoficial em nome do presidente @LulaOficial colocando-se √† disposi√ß√£o da cidade do Rio no enfrentamento dos problemas causados pelas chuvas que nos atingiram na madrugada de domingo. Agrade√ßo pela solidariedade e apoio‚Äù, escreveu Paes no X.
Em outra uma postagem, o prefeito ressaltou que mesmo com a libera√ß√£o da Avenida Brasil ‚Äì uma das principais vias do Rio -, o munic√≠pio segue em Est√°gio 4, pen√∫ltimo n√≠vel de perigo. Refor√ßou que a recomenda√ß√£o √© para que a popula√ß√£o evite deslocamentos pela cidade. Disse ainda para as pessoas manterem-se seguras e atentas √†s informa√ß√µes do Centro de Opera√ß√µes Rio.
